PerfectNetExp.abs: 词根联想记忆法词汇教程(一)|联想记忆法背单词 ... auspicious adj. 幸运的；吉兆的 aversion n. 厌恶 avert v. 转移；避免，防止.
新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... aver v. 断言证明 aversion ?n. 嫌恶，憎恨，反感 avid ? adj. 热切的.
...对手；注意：adversity(灾难)(同) 同根词: versatile(多功能的, 多才的); aversion(反感)
forex - dollar eases as risk aversion persists ., 汇市美元以减轻风险规避存在.

list.abs: 厌恶疗法(aversion therapy)是通过直接或间接想象将某种不愉快的刺激与个体的不良行为结合起来,使个体最终厌恶并放弃这种行为。利用条件反射原理,建立痛苦刺激与不良.
Blog of You to Work ... 677、Risk 风险 678、Risk averse 风险规避 679、Risk spreading 风险分摊.
损失规避（英文：Loss aversion），又称损失厌恶性，是指在展望理论中，人们在对同样大小概率的选择的时候，相对于获得，往往 …
损失厌恶（loss aversion）是指人们面对同样的损失和收益时感到损失对情绪影响更大。与此相关联的是禀赋效应（endowment effect…
雅思词汇：同义词组汇总（3）-上海育路网 ... allergic to 对...极厌恶;对...过敏 averse to 讨厌... disapprove of 不赞同,不喜欢.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (originally denoting the action of turning away or averting one's eyes): from Latin aversio(n-), from avertere 'turn away from' (see avert)

entry.def: If you have an aversion to someone or something, you dislike them very much.

example.ex: Many people have a natural and emotional aversion to insects.

means.word_mean: 2. the act of turning yourself (or your gaze) away;

sentences.sentence: "averting her gaze meant that she was angry"

auth_sentence.content: Perhaps it just indicates an aversion to physical violence.

auth_sentence.content: He had an aversion to sleeping while travelling.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 逆的,相反的;敌对的;不利的;有害的

a坏+vers转+e→往坏转→反感的
con一起+verse=vers转+ant……的→在一起转→很熟悉的
con共同+vers转+e→两个共同对着转→相反的
di分开+vers转+e→转开了→不同的
in进+vers转+e→转进去得→倒转的
ir不+reversible[adj.可逆的]→adj.不可逆转的

reverse反转的+ible可..的→可反转的,可逆的
